alert.note: Alert for Central Orangeburg; Clarendon; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 31 at 12:19AM EDT until further notice by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central South Carolina, including the following areas, Bamberg, Calhoun, Central Orangeburg, Clarendon, Lee, Northwestern Orangeburg, Southeastern Orangeburg and Sumter. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - While flash flooding may be over, aerial flooding continues across the watch area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
